solution_line_template: Tammy can eat twice as many pickle slices as Sammy who eats {sammy_slices} so Tammy can eat {sammy_slices}*{tammy_multiplier} = <<{sammy_slices}*{tammy_multiplier}={tammy_slices}>>{tammy_slices} pickle slices

Ron eats {percent_fewer_num}% fewer pickle slices than Tammy who eats {tammy_slices} pickle slices so that's {percent_fewer_decimal}*{tammy_slices} = <<{percent_fewer_num}*{percent_factor}*{tammy_slices}={fewer_slices}>>{fewer_slices} fewer slices than Tammy
Tammy eats {tammy_slices} slices and Ron eats {fewer_slices} less, then Ron eats {tammy_slices}-{fewer_slices} = <<{tammy_slices}-{fewer_slices}={ron_slices}>>{ron_slices} pickle slices
